alert.note: Alert for Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:38PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sangamon County through 415 PM CDT... At 338 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Springfield, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 90 and 92. Interstate 72 between mile markers 89 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Illinois.
